message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but that's a bit steep for me. I'm interested in the product, but I could only do it for a price closer to $100.
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob, but I've got to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $160 for the product.
I appreciate you coming down a bit, Alice. How about we split the difference and do it for $130? That's a fair deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to give up on getting a bit more for the product. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get at least $145 for it.
